Articles.Content:
Im wondering who else is attempting the same thing, building a town, or maybe even some city on the Mun or Minmus? I\'ve already gotten my first building down, a simple piece. Its a small tower, and you are able to walk around the inside, and go up to the roof

I like making big, dumb things to fly around, and watching a tower landing on a moon is quite funny in its own way ;P Im working on making a actual vehicle now 8)

If anybody else is working on such a thing, please share. Im interested to see what other people have come up with

Three things.

1. Stogas has been doing similar things.

2. That second pic gave me an idea... Mun zombies.

3. Did you cheat, or what? I am having trouble believing that you could have done this legitimately.

Three things.

1. Stogas has been doing similar things.

2. That second pic gave me an idea... Mun zombies.

3. Did you cheat, or what? I am having trouble believing that you could have done this legitimately.

You\'re not helping, don\'t be so negative. Just because someone else has done something doesn\'t mean someone else can\'t post it as well.
You know, this sort of makes me want to recreate the derelict spacecraft from the original Alien in KSP. Anyways, good job! I could never fly something like that to the moon.

You\'re not helping, don\'t be so negative. Just because someone else has done something doesn\'t mean someone else can\'t post it as well.

It\'s alright, I did ask who has been doing similar things, so it did answer my question.

Did you cheat, or what? I am having trouble believing that you could have done this legitimately.

And no, I did it legitimately. It was a lot easier than I expected, no lag, seemed pretty light, and the parts were able to absorb the impact pretty easily. I have 2 of the big fuel tanks and a LFE in the building, and my stage before had 14 tanks, and 14 LFE\'s.

You\'re not helping, don\'t be so negative. Just because someone else has done something doesn\'t mean someone else can\'t post it as well.

I was unaware that he needed help in the first place. Secondly, how am I being at all negative? I am simply asking a question, and answering one of his.
